mods.preference.BackgroundModePreference.android:title: Enable Custom Background
mods.preference.BackgroundModePreference.android:summary: Allows you to set a custom background

mods.preference.BackgroundBlurPreference.android:title: Blur Custom Background
mods.preference.BackgroundBlurPreference.android:summary: Blurs the background, improving text legibility

mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:title: Background Color
mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:summary: Select the color of the chat background

mods.preference.CustomFont.android:title: Custom Font
mods.preference.CustomFont.android:summary: Set the font inside the conversation screen

mods.preference.SimpleDialogPreference.android:title: Custom Font Size
mods.preference.SimpleDialogPreference.android:dialogMessage: Looking to change the font size of text messages? Discord already has this built in!\n\nGo back out to User Settings > Appearance > Chat Font Scaling and customize it there!

SwitchPreference.android:title: Square Pictures
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, guild and profile icons will be squares

SwitchPreference.android:title: Marquee Names
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, channel names and usernames will scroll if they are too long to display

SwitchPreference.android:title: High Quality Icons
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, guild and profile icons will appear in higher quality (do not use on low end phones)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Remove Nitro Gift Button
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, it will remove the Nitro Gift button from the message tray

SwitchPreference.android:title: Remove Call Button
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, it will remove the voice and video call options to prevent accidental outgoing calls

SwitchPreference.android:title: Remove Invite Button
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, it will remove the invite button from the channel list to prevent accidental clicks

SwitchPreference.android:title: Remove Animated Icons
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, guild and profile icons will no longer animate\nWARNING: this replaces animated profile pictures everywhere, even when viewing profiles directly

ListPreference.android:title: Text Color Mode
ListPreference.android:summary: Allows you to customize text colors for messages (read explanation)

mods.preference.SimpleDialogPreference.android:title: Text Color Mode Explanation
mods.preference.SimpleDialogPreference.android:dialogMessage:
Custom Colors - allows you to set custom colors for your text messages (incoming and outgoing)

Match Role Color - text messages will always match the role color of the sender

Default - normal behavior, no color modifications

mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:title: Incoming Text Color
mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:summary: Select the message text color representing other people

mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:title: Outgoing Text Color
mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:summary: Select the color of your message text

mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:title: Deleted Message Color
mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:summary: Select the color of deleted messages\n(Note that Anti Message Delete must be enabled)

SwitchPreference.android:title: Custom Message Name Colors
SwitchPreference.android:summary: If enabled, the name color of the message author can be customized

mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:title: Incoming Name Color
mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:summary: Select the name color representing other people

mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:title: Outgoing Name Color
mods.preference.ColorPicker.android:summary: Select the name color of your message

mods.preference.RainbowTextPreference.android:title: Rainbow Colors
mods.preference.RainbowTextPreference.android:summary: This allows you to animate text and typing box colors.\nNOTE: This will override your other color settings if enabled

mods.preference.EmptyPreference.android:title: Bluecord made with love by Blue\nhttps://bluesmods.com
